text: Carlo Delle Piane (2 February 1936 â€“ 23 August 2019) was an Italian actor. From 1948 until his death, he appeared in more than 100 movies.E' morto Carlo Delle Piane, 110 film in 70 anni di carriera He was born in Rome. In 1984, he won the Nastro d'Argento for Best Actor for his role in Una gita scolastica. For his role in Regalo di Natale he won the Volpi Cup. Delle Piane died on 23 August 2019 in Rome at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Carlo Delle Piane
